header.headertext: AMENDMENT TO BE MOVED IN GRAND COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: After Clause 1, insert the following new Clause—
(1) Section 235 of the Gambling Act 2005 (gaming machine) is amended as follows.
(2) In subsection (2), after paragraph (i) insert “, and
text.IndentOne: (j) a machine is not a gaming machine by reason only of the fact that it is remote gambling equipment (within the meaning of section 36) which is made available for use in a casino.”
text.quote: “(2A) The Secretary of State may by regulations provide for the maximum number of machines to which subsection (2)(j) applies that may be made available for use in a casino.””
